URL handling for the ObiWAN Gemini protocol library

This module provides URL parsing and manipulation functionality for Gemini protocol URLs, using the Webby library for robust URL handling.

Types

QueryParams = wb.QueryParams
Url = wb.Url

Procs

proc combineUrl(baseUrl, target: Url): Url {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Combine two URLs for handling relative redirects This is particularly useful for handling Gemini redirects 
proc fromUri(uri: Uri): Url {....raises: [CatchableError], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Convert a Nim standard library Uri to a Webby URL This is useful for transitioning code while maintaining compatibility 
proc geminiPort(url: Url): int {....raises: [ValueError], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Get the port from a Gemini URL, defaulting to 1965 if not specified 
proc parseGeminiUrl(urlStr: string): Url {....raises: [CatchableError], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Parse a Gemini URL string into a URL object This handles Gemini-specific validation and defaults 
proc toUri(url: Url): Uri {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Convert a Webby URL to a Nim standard library Uri This is useful for transitioning code while maintaining compatibility 
proc unbracketed(hostname: string): string {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Remove IPv6 brackets from hostname if present This is useful when passing a hostname to socket functions 
proc validateGeminiUrl(url: Url): bool {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Validate that a URL is a valid Gemini URL Returns true if the URL is valid for Gemini usage
